sqlMap.insert: SELECT CS_LOGINSENDLOG_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUALINSERT INTO CS_LOGINSENDLOG(ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME) VALUES (#id#,#sendInfo#,#receiveInfo#,#account#,#sendTime#,#receiveTime#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM CS_LOGINSENDLOG WHERE ID IN ($ids$)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CS_LOGINSENDLOG SET DELETEFLAG=1 WHERE ID=#id#
UPDATE CS_LOGINSENDLOG SET DELETEFLAG=1 WHERE ID IN ($ids$)
sqlMap.select: select ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME,r from (select ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME, rownum r from (select ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME from CS_LOGINSENDLOG order by $orderBy$ $asc$ )) where r >#start# and r <= #end#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CS_LOGINSENDLOG (ID=#id#)(SENDINFO like '%$sendInfo$%')(RECEIVEINFO like '%$receiveInfo$%')(ACCOUNT like '%$account$%')( to_char(SENDTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') like '%$sendTime$%')( to_char(RECEIVETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') like '%$receiveTime$%')

select r,ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME from (select ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME, rownum r from (select ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME from CS_LOGINSENDLOG (ID=#id#)(SENDINFO like '%$sendInfo$%')(RECEIVEINFO like '%$receiveInfo$%')(ACCOUNT like '%$account$%')( to_char(SENDTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') like '%$sendTime$%')( to_char(RECEIVETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') like '%$receiveTime$%') order by $orderBy$ $asc$ )) where r >#start# and r <=#end#

select ID,SENDINFO,RECEIVEINFO,ACCOUNT,SENDTIME,RECEIVETIME from CS_LOGINSENDLOG (ID=#id#)(SENDINFO like '%$sendInfo$%')(RECEIVEINFO like '%$receiveInfo$%')(ACCOUNT like '%$account$%')( to_char(SENDTIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') like '%$sendTime$%')( to_char(RECEIVETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') like '%$receiveTime$%') order by $orderBy$ $asc$
